text:
A Tense Exchange

Dimly lit room, young man and old woman.  
Uncertainty hangs in the air.  
Young man: “Hand it over.”  

Old woman: “Just a moment…”  

Young man (thinking): “What’s in that chest?”  

---  

Old woman returns, keys jingling.  
Old woman: “Thirty-five copecks total.”  

Young man: “What! Only a rouble and fifteen?”  

Old woman: “Just so.”  

Young man (hesitant): “I… I’ll take it.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The young man reluctantly pawns his watch to the old woman, contemplating her possessions and the degrading nature of the transaction.
